name: Triangle Legacy Revolution
description:
Note: I'm now distributing my work through another site. Check it out at Chapman Games!

Triangle Legacy Revolution is a fast-paced, action-packed platform game with a huge, open world and a story-driven adventure!

When the evil President Hexagon orders another village wiped from the face of Shape World, Blue Triangle loses everyone and everything he's ever cared about, and sees the need for a better world. Help him travel across hundreds of levels in nine different environments as he works to incite revolution against the Hexagon Hive.

  • Navigate nine unique worlds, each boasting 20-40 levels! Shape World is a geographically diverse planet with vibrant, far-flung lands to explore...the adventure provides days or even weeks of gameplay.
  • Learn new abilities to get past a series of increasingly complicated puzzles! As you defeat President Hexagon's thuggish enforcers, you will acquire more skills to serve you in the tasks ahead.
  • Collect hidden items and uncover secret challenges to power up. Good things happen to players who unravel the secrets of Shape World!
